questions.quote: How could she say that on TV?.. And how did she get a cable special . I 've never gotten a cable special.....well that's it I'm not giving her any more material. We are incommunicado.  ...Exactly.
I don't know. She was so beautiful, it was like a pure reflex. The words just came out of my mouth.
